label: cascading_failure_01_ep_023
content:
## 2024-02-06 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 157800 | p50: 220ms p95: 590ms p99: 1120ms | err: 3.55% (5600 errors) | success: 96.45%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 157200 | p50: 190ms p95: 500ms p99: 860ms | err: 0.95% (1500 errors) | success: 99.05%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 153400 | p50: 360ms p95: 710ms p99: 850ms | err: 0.45% (690 errors) | success: 99.55%
- /auth: REQUESTS 204700 | p50: 50ms p95: 130ms p99: 245ms | err: 0.19% (380 errors) | success: 99.81%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 276300 | p50: 66ms p95: 198ms p99: 365ms | err: 0.17% (480 errors) | success: 99.83%
- /search: REQUESTS 241100 | p50: 88ms p95: 245ms p99: 440ms | err: 0.27% (640 errors) | success: 99.73%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 195400 | p50: 115ms p95: 325ms p99: 560ms | err: 0.33% (640 errors) | success: 99.67%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 78% | Mem 83% | Disk 63% | Conns: 7100 | Net: 750/910 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 75% | Mem 81% | Disk 62% | Conns: 6905 | Net: 730/885 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 86% | Mem 85% | Disk 61% | Conns: 7800 | Net: 820/960 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 52% | Mem 83% | Disk 88% | Conns: 460 | Net: 198/238 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 260 | idle 0 | waiting 420 | exhaustion: 32 | max: 260 | avg_wait: 320ms
- replica: active 100 | idle 0 | waiting 95 | exhaustion: 12 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 88ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 260 | exhaustion: 40 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 420ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 91.6% | Bandwidth: 9.9 Gbps | Origin requests: 520300

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] UPSTREAM-LATENCY on gateway-02: geo_lookup_p99_ms=850
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-01: pool=third_party_geo events=40 waiting=260
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-01: error_pct=3.55

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments

### Events
- Enabled feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' for 25% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Added dedicated egress NAT for geo vendor traffic
- Opened vendor incident with geo provider (ticket ID provided)

### On-Call
- Shift: L. Nguyen. 18 pages. 6 tickets (VEND-110, CO-856, POOL-620, NAT-12, GW-389, FF-99). Status: Mitigating.
